name: The things we do for Love
name_original: The things we do for Love
description:
A princess wants to date a knightess. The knightess agrees. The king does not.

The obvious solution: Sneak through the requisite dungeon to get into the castle anyway. Alas, our heroine is a bit overeager, and finds her movement a bit out of control - once started, she won't stop, you can only shift to a different direction. And not just that, her time's limited to - and so are her action. Too many inputs, and she's literally out of controls and probably on her way to fall into a pit!

Which brings us to controls:

WASD/Arrows for movement. These just initiate movement and are relative to the camera view.

Space to Jump.

Q/E, Left/Right ALT or mouse buttons to rotate the camera.

ESCAPE to restart a level, in case you already know you won't be able to finish it.

Alt+F4 to quit.
